TRIGGER.ANYEXPLAIN: If checked this bonus will be applicable for any deposit.

EXPLAIN.5: This bonus will be allocated if the player completes {{type}} # {{amount}} in total.
EXPLAIN.4: This bonus will be allocated if the player completes {{type}} # {{amount}} for the week.
EXPLAIN.3: This bonus will be allocated if the player completes {{type}} # {{amount}} for the day.
EXPLAIN.2: This bonus will be allocated if the player completes {{type}} # {{amount}} for the month.
EXPLAIN.1: This bonus will be allocated if the player completes {{type}} # {{amount}} for the year.

TRIGGERAMOUNT.LABEL: Number
TRIGGERAMOUNT.DESCRIPTION: This is the amount combined with the selection below to determine when the bonus should be allocated.

TRIGGERGRANULARITY.DESCRIPTION: Please see the example below for and explanation of the trigger selected.

TYPE.DESCRIPTION: Please select the type of bonus to create

TRIGGERTYPE.LABEL: Trigger Type
TRIGGERTYPE.DESCRIPTION: Please select the type of trigger for this bonus.
